oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of novel Fungal Biocontrol Agents
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eiben, Ute
Lüth, Dr. Peter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One of the tasks within the scope of REPCO is to select fungal isolates from a group of candidates highly hyperparasitc to Venturia inaequalis on apple.The selected isolates should be suitable for large-scale biotechnological production processes based on Solid-State fermentation. Therefore the ability to formulate a final product suitable for application and with good shelf-life and cost-competitiveness characteristics is also to be tested.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eiben, Ute and Lüth, Dr. Peter (2006) Development of novel Fungal Biocontrol Agents. Poster at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
